title: Marlon Brando | One-Eyed Jacks (1961) Western Movie | Remastered

sources.title: Marlon Brando | One-Eyed Jacks (1961) Western Movie | Remastered
sources.description:
The motion picture that starts its own tradition of greatness.
After being betrayed and captured following a bank robbery in Mexico, Kid Rio escapes prison and embarks on a quest for revenge against his former partner, Dad Longworth. Years later, Rio tracks down Longworth, who has since settled into a comfortable life as sheriff in Monterey, California. To settle the score, Rio plans to seduce Longworth's stepdaughter, rob the town's bank, and kill Dad. However, as Rio's elaborate revenge unfolds, the lines between right and wrong blur, and both men must face the consequences of their actions.

Original title: One-Eyed Jacks (1961) 


This film is available in English, and dubbed French, German, Italian, Portuguese & Spanish audio.  Also subtitled in many more language options.

Director: Marlon Brando
Writers: Guy Trosper, Calder Willingham, Charles Neider
Stars: Marlon Brando, Karl Malden, Pina Pellicer, Katy Jurado & Slim Pickens
Genres: Drama, Western

FUN FACT: Initially, the renowned Stanley Kubrick signed on to direct the film. Many script rewrites & disagreements over casting choices, resulted in Kubrick's dismissal from the project. Brando took over as director, leading to a tumultuous and costly production and post-production process.
